curators.name: Zorian
curators.bio: Time loop enthusiast. If a story has a protagonist reliving the same day, I've probably read it.

curators.name: ForumDelver
curators.bio: Excavating the best stories from SpaceBattles and SV since 2015. Forum format doesn't scare me.

curators.name: BingeWatcher
curators.bio: Only completed stories. Life's too short for indefinite hiatuses.
